title: 2024 Roberts/Roberson vacation
text: This home was amazing. The amenities were amazing. The resort was beautiful. We had an amazing time. Will definitely book again.

title: Booking.com app
text: This app is so easy to use to book a trip for motel accommodations and the cheapest rates thanks Booking.Com for an awesome app

title: Redlands
text: Easy to use

title: Hosts can’t message guests until they confirm
text:
When the guest request to book my location they send a message with it. I then approve the request. Then have to wait until the guest confirms the booking and pays to be able to actually begin to message them. This is extremely bad for business because some guests might have questions about the property or the area. This is the only site the doesn’t have the messaging feature at the start of the inquiry. Please update your software or hire someone who knows how to.
Sincerely,
Every single host!

title: Booking makes  it easy
text: I love booking on the booking app. You get free cancellation and I love to browse through the pictures and reviews. Most informative. And when I want to find my booking I just click on the app… and there is all the info I need. Love Booking

title: Waste of time and money!
text: Do not book a reservation. They make it super easy to book and take your card information ‘no charge’ ‘pay at property’ options are bogus! Come check out time you can’t pay for your reservation with card or cash because some technical issues with booking party. Can’t even cancel your reservation; you need to call and they put in the request via email to hotel and fees may or may not apply depending. Ugghh just overall horrible experience; have tried to use this app twice and never again.

title: Very good customer service
text: Customer Service Agent Ma Lyka S. was very kind and extremely effective with helping switch our dates around with impressive speed completing the task. Thank you.

title: PERFECT STAY
text: My family and I stayed at Sonder Downtown Towers for 6 nights and everything was just perfect! The location, the friendly staff, the spacious rooms and bathrooms , the cleanliness and the convenience of all the rooms. The entire room is well decorated with modern and clean  vibe !!! We will definitely recommend our friends to stay at Sonder and for sure, they won’t regret it!!! Thank you for making our stay better  in Dubai . We enjoyed everything!!!

title: Error on birth date
text: Help the application is registering the birthday off by one day it has happened on 3 of my current bookings

title: Great Deals
text: Booking.com allowed me to cut off at least a third of hotel costs. I’m a fan!

text: A very convenient site. Very quite place. Very nice for times of a get away and r and r.

title: Bad customer service
text: Booking.com is good when it works but good luck with getting help from customer service when there’s problem. They will not update you on your case nor help, instead they will tell you to contact the hotel directly. Instead of using this, just book directly from the hotel.

title: Economy inn Portland
text: The staff was great I would definitely recommend it here and would come back the staff was really nice and so was the room very well kept

title: Payment
text: Where is the PayPal? They used to be PayPal, they have so everyone can usually later pay where to go????

title: Peaceful and beautiful
text: We loved our peaceful and quaint pt. We will definitely be back.

title: Our stay at courtyard
text: This place is awesome the service and hotel both. Really can’t say enough about it.

title: Getting worse day by day
text: They take the money in a minute from your account, when they supposed to refund it will never happen. I called them five times to refund: they keep promising, but they never refund around $300. A year ago they didn’t refund around $75 as well. It is a shame for a business to deal with customers like this.

title: Never lets me down
text: I’ve used this app here and in Europe. It never lets me down in quality and price .

title: Amazing place
text: The hotel staff was super nice and helpful. The breakfast was really on point. The rooms were cleaned and the location couldn’t be any better. The only thing I would recommend is that they place clocks in the rooms.

title: Scam!
text:
I’ve booked the 1 bedroom apartment for my mom’s first visit to LA and this host appeared to be a scammer! The say you have to contact the host to get a door code to get in - no one answered me or booking management! Another day the sent me a message that my booking is for the next year! Ridiculous! No apology and they also think that I’m a stupid. And then they sent me a message ghat I didn’t show up at the place! Scammers! Just imagine what if I don’t have money for another booking! Luckily my mom wasn’t alone here and I was able to help! Never use this service again!
The hotel name: HOLLYWOOD BUSINESS APARTMENTS.  And the have the rating of 8 and 4 stars! Be aware!
Worst experience in my life!

title: Falta de reembolso
text: Cancelaron los boletos de avión que avía comprado para mi esposa y hijo que porque no eran los titulares de la targeta y el banco les iso el depósito del precio total de los boletos ya casi es un mes y aún no e recibido respuesta del reembolso de mi dinero

title: Horrible people and website
text: me and my husband went to gatlinburg TN for a getaway and wanted to stay an extra couple of nights but wanted to get a cabin and I found one and booked it over the phone from their website, so we drove all the way to it.. payment declines, called them and they said the reason it declined was because my information wasn’t matching up (meaning my last name on my debit card was different than my new last name) I knew this and advised them that I was recently married and was in the process of changing everything to match my new last name!!! and I answered all their questions correctly even asked me to send a picture of me and my DL (which I did) had me on hold for a long time and then had the audacity to tell me that I cannot rent the cabin or any other place from them as I have been banned from ever booking with them in the future.. I even told them I could send my marriage license to prove I am who I say I am!! They went to the next extreme!! They refused to listen to me!! they straight up blacklisted me over the fact that my last name on my debit card was different than my new last name!!! Are you kidding me!??!  Shame on you for ruining my families getaway! that was the first time I used you and apparently the last time!!! It was supposed to be a simple process. Worse booking place ever.

title: Odlicno
text: Pohvala i preporuka

title: A week of total satisfaction!!!
text: First time to visit Japan with my wife and very lucky indeed to book and stayed in this hotel!!! It’s centrally located, so accessible to the train station , sorrounded by excellent and good restaurants , hotel staff are so accommodating and very helpful with directions and knowledgeable and daily supplies with toiletries, facial creams and breakfast has lots of selections , good coffee and a very reasonable hotel rates!!!! This is a very highly recommended hotel in Tokyo area and will definitely come back and stay here again and again!!!! Thank you so much Booking. Com for a well deserved treat!!! To the staff of the hotel, hats off to you all!!!! Arigato and Sayonara!!!!!

title: Bait and switch scambug app!!

title: Love this App
text:
Booking.Com is a traveler’s best friend.  Love the convenience of opening the app and having all the help I need to plan a great trip. I also love all the rewards you offer!  (I’m currently on Level 3 Genius, if you know, you know!!)
Mobile deals, etc….
Keep up the good work guys.

title: Filter for price is broken
text: I used to love the app but now it is so difficult to use the filter to price is broken and it doesn’t allow you to choose hotels with certain number of stars

title: Best Traveling app ever
text: This the best traveling and most guaranteed app ever as i’m from 2015 using the app for my all trips around the world

title: Customer service over the phone
text:
Booking.com
Is great apps for accommodation and car rental. However it’s not that easy to communicate upon calling the hotline and ask for help. Upon calling there should be a selection for English language not just the language on a specific country like France. Before I settled the problem it takes me 3 hours to explain and find someone who can understand French language.

title: Excellent
text: Really long journeys of my Booking apps on my existing hotel and flight booking I have been enjoying lot with discounts and facilities as I am now reach Genius 3 maximum accordingly

title: Travel protection does basically nothing
text: I always get the travel protection and in the end it doesn’t help. My flight got cancelled last minute and they did nothing. Airline ended up helping me more than booking. Another time I had to cancel my flight and the protection did not cover that either. Even with a medical note there’s still 0 guarantee so what is the point.

title: Thank you
text: The place was wonderful. The host always was there to take care of us. Game room had a lot to offer for everyone.
